articles.title: India bans wheat export: From Argentina to Turkey, countries that have stopped overseas food trade
articles.description: The West criticised India's decision to impose a ban on wheat exports after costs rose and a record-breaking heatwave damaged crops. However, India isn't the only country doing so after the Russia-Ukraine war broke out, which drove up food prices across the world

articles.title: Eight people arrested in Ecuador for recruiting for armed groups
articles.description:
Eight people have been arrested on charges that they were involved in forcibly recruiting Ecuadoreans for armed groups, the country's prosecutor's office said on Thursday.
"According to the charge sheets, Ecuadoreans were recruited with the offer of going to enroll in courses in Argentina and Mexico," said the prosecution.
articles.content: Eight people have been arrested on charges that they were involved in forcibly recruiting Ecuadoreans for armed groups, the country's prosecutor's office said on Thursday. The prosecution said on its Twitter account the eight were arrested during sim... [1187 chars]

articles.title: Aurelien Tchouameni close to Liverpool as star opens door to move; Spurs near deal for Argentina star
articles.description: Liverpool are edging closer to Aurelien Tchouameni, Tottenham are favourites to land an Argentina star, while Leicester want a £50m-rated Brighton star.
articles.content:
Liverpool are edging closer towards a £59m deal for Aurelien Tchouameni, Tottenham are now favourites to land an exciting Argentina star, while Thursday’s Transfer Gossip claims Leicester are asking about a £50m-rated Brighton star.

articles.title: The destruction of Gran Chaco, forgotten sister of the Amazon rainforest - podcast
articles.description: It’s a wake-up call for the world’s forests. Madeleine Finlay hears from biodiversity reporter Patrick Greenfield about what his trip deep inside Argentina’s precious region showed him and what’s needed to end deforestation by 2030, as promised at Cop26
articles.content: From deep inside Gran Chaco, a dry tropical forest in Argentina one and a half times the size of California, comes a wake-up call for the world’s forests. We’ve lost more than a fifth of this incredibly biodiverse region since 1985. And it’s just one... [572 chars]

articles.title: TINI Leads Billboard Argentina Hot 100 With ‘La Triple T’
articles.description: Plus, Bad Bunny debuts nine songs, led by “Ojitos Lindos” at No. 19.
articles.content: TINI scores her third No. 1 on the Billboard Argentina Hot 100 chart as “La Triple T” flies 53-1 on the ranking dated May 14. It’s the biggest jump to the top since her own “Miénteme,” with Maria Becerra, rocketed up the chart 75-1 on the May 8, 2021... [1801 chars]

articles.title: An Argentine libertarian channels inner Trump to 'blow up' political status quo
articles.description: Now he has a shot of taking them down at the ballot box. The admirer of former U.S. President Donald Trump, who was elected to the lower house last year, has surged in opinion polls ahead of Argentina's 2023 presidential election with attacks on the political mainstream and pledges for total economic freedom.
articles.content:
Javier Milei, an ebullient Argentine economist with wild hair and an avid fan base, was once known for his theatrical and acerbic televised takedowns of the country's political elite. Now he has a shot of taking them down at the ballot box.
The admir... [3586 chars]

articles.title: How pro-choice messaging on abortion is evolving.
articles.description: American activists have a lot to learn from Ireland and Argentina.
